page.title: 04 ASH FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: {Ash Rovers Football Club}was started in 1972 by{Mr Fred Collins}.It started because there were a lot of people who wished to play football.There are three different teams. In each team there 12 players, including the substitute.Altogether there are 36 club members,as well as six other people who help. The strip is blue shirts and black shorts,but the strip is not the same for all the teams.The changed strip is white shirts and black shorts.All the changed strips are the same. Training is on Wednesday's.The teams have a break from training between seasons. Ash Rovers have won some cups this season,which makes twelve altogether.
